channel.description: Recent content on ALways Ask Why ...

item.title: 2018 03 18 Making a Personal Blog With Blogdown and Hugo
item.description: Install Hugo using blogdown from Rstudio blogdown::install_hugo() Install Hugo using blogdown from a local directory blogdown:::install_hugo_bin(“path/to/hugo.exe”) Links https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/ Create new site library(blogdown) new_site(theme = “road2stat/hugo-tanka”, theme_example = TRUE)

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
